name: A little simulation
description:
You wake up in a mysterious room... with a VR headset on your head. Will you find a way to get out? Enter your game and fight for key to open door. Each time you right click, you change dimension, from reality to the game. You need space in the reality to move in the game. Don't die or you will restart from the beginning. Good luck!

Arrow keys or WASD to move. Left click to shoot. Right click to toggle Reality/Game

I just learned programming on my labtop 7 days ago and I am happy  to show you this little demo I made in those 7 day for Brackeys Game Jam!
